Desde la semana pasada he estado avisando que estaba totalmente enganchada a la saga #TheRoyals, pero en la reseña que he publicado hoy de «La princesa de papel» (el link directo está en la bio) he intentado explicar el por qué de que me haya vuelto adicta a una novela que está plagada de cliché y con una relación tóxica. Solo puedo adelantar que esta trilogía está desde ya en la lista de mis mejores lecturas del 2017

#BookishMayFlowers #Day18z Favorite classic.
___

Confession: I want to be one of those people who reads a bunch of the classics. I really do. But the old fashioned language tends to take me out of the story and causes me to get bored. Do any of you guys have this problem and have found a way around it? 
___

Anyway, I was assigned this in an English class in college and It's been one of my favorite books since.

¡Nueva reseña en el blog! "No volveré a tener miedo" de Pablo Rivero (@pabloriveroficial). Mañana se publica este thriller que sorprende con personajes muy oscuros, intriga, lenguaje fluido y un final que me dejó muy sorprendido cambiando la percepción de lo que había leído desde el comienzo. Muy recomendado. (Ver link al blog en la bio de mi perfil)
¿Os gustan los thrillers? ¿Cuál os ha sorprendido más recientemente?

Pertama, "Selamat Hari Buku Nasional"… teman-teman buku semuanyaa… 🎉📚.
Senang rasanya kembali bertemu dengan hari ini… 🤓😁📚.
Anw, melalui kecintaan pada buku, aku bertemu dengan banyak teman yang ternyata sama cintanya dengan buku. 
Jadi, teman-teman yang belum begitu tertarik buat baca-baca buku, yuk mulai meluangkan waktu untuk membaca buku. Selain buku itu menyenangkan, kita juga dapat tahu lebih banyak dari yang kita pikirkan. Melalui buku, kita dapat mengubah sudut pandang kita terhadap kehidupan dan sekitarnya. Membuka pikiran dan menginspirasi kita untuk melakukan hal yang lebih baik untuk masa depan 🌻.
. "A books is a magic carpet thats flies you of elsewhere. A book is a door. You open it. You step through." ~ Jeanette  Winterson. #quote 🌻.
.

Yap. Setuju sekali dengan kutipan di atas. Buku itu ajaib sekali. Bisa membawamu ke mana saja. Ke tempat-tempat yang mungkin tidak akan bisa/ sempat dikunjungi tanpa harus meninggalkan tempat duduk kita. Buku akan mengajak bertualang. Seru. Melintasi ruang dan waktu.
Dan, menurut penelitian juga, buku dapat mencegah masa tua kita dari penyakit pikun. Dengan catatan, buku untuk dibaca 😂✌📚 🌻. Itulah sebabnya mengapa buku begitu penting dan bermanfaat untuk duniaku dan juga duniamu.  #bukuuntukduniaku @gramediabooks #makeIndonesiareadagain
.
.

📷 Day 16: Needs a Cover Change for #rfabmay17 📚

I definitely feel like this series needs a cover change. It has had many along the way, but none of them are any good and they're all too similar. This series just seems to have some of the ugliest covers out there 😂 Honestly, it put me off buying the series for so long until these editions came out. And even then, I am still not a fan of the covers. I feel they could do with a much better look that would make them appeal to people and want them to actually pick them up. I have owned this whole series for so long now and I still haven't read them 🙈

Who has read this series? Did you enjoy it?

"Orange is the early morning sun stretching across the sky and the color of a burning ember standing tall in the middle of a beach bonfire. It’s leaves in the fall, carrots in Nana’s vegetable soup on a cold winter day, tulips in the spring, and the ladybugs in the middle of the grassy park on a hot summer afternoon. Orange is life. It’s unexpected but beautiful."
Aly Martinez

Holy cow I can't believe we are half way through the month... although it feels as though it's going at a glacial pace! 😫
☕️
My BG bestie @a_tad_bit_bookish posted something awesome about our prompt for #squeakybookishlibrary and it got me thinking. I'm #currentlyreading Stalking Jack the Ripper. The female in it goes against societal norm. She wants to solve the case and deal with dead bodies! lol. Although Rachael never did that.... she did carve her own path. She didn't get married like everyone thought she should. She made her own path! I love that about her. 💓
☕️
Have you read Stalking Jack the Ripper?? No spoilers please ... I'm almost done. ☕️
#ampersandmay17 ~ winter (it does seem an it chilly // #90sbookishgrunge Ice ice baby ~ cold character... I don't think you can get colder than saucy Jack! .
